LanguageData.AYPotash.label: Potash
LanguageData.AYPotash.description: Potash is a compound containing potassium. Leeched from wood ashes it is used in making soaps.
LanguageData.AYLimewater.label: Limewater
LanguageData.AYLimewater.description: Limewater is a solution of Sodium or Calcium Hydroxide. It is an alkali that can be used in making soaps.
